## Checklist
Before submitting this ticket, make sure this ticket:
- [ ] Is **labelled properly**.
- [ ] Has the **SPUR project assigned to it**.
- [ ] Has an **assigned milestone**.

And lastly:
- [ ] Once someone picks up this ticket, **make sure to assign it**.
